Listing 24.16: Example of a function to evaluate a model with parameterized data
standardization.
We can also update the run experiment() to repeat the experiment 10 times for each param-
eter; in this case, only two parameters will be evaluated [False, True] for no standardization
and standardization respectively.
# run an experiment
def run_experiment(params, repeats=10):
# load data
trainX, trainy, testX, testy = load_dataset()
# test each parameter
all_scores = list()
for p in params:
